    Digi Telecommunications Sdn. Bhd. Vacancies Senior, Training and Audit - (J094833)

    November 25, 2020

    TOC

    • Job Description
    • Company Overview
    • How To Apply

    Digi Telecommunications Sdn. Bhd. is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Senior, Training and Audit - (J094833) position. If you currently looking for new education sector job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

    Job Description

    You are:

    Passionate advocate for the continually evolving Business landscape needs/requirements. Able to identify opportunities driving Channel Development associated to specific business segments and map relevant initiatives/enhancements/programs accordingly High levels of attention-to-detail. Comfortable executing a broad range of activities simultaneously while maintaining quality and managing priorities effectively Highly collaborative, working co-operatively internally and with internal and external partners to drive successful outcomes

    Your Responsibilities:

    • Channel Development onboarding ownership. Manage whole Channel onboarding and training to new Sales Representatives and Dealers in Business Division. Collaborate and coordinate with internal and external stakeholders in driving Professionalization targets.

    • Drive digital onboarding positioning to support Digital Transformation.

    • Develop, curate and maintain updated training programs & learning materials. Work with related subject matter experts to co-create/develop new relevant learning materials.

    • Sales/Channel Training Calendar ownership. Jointly identify/develop training content/programs in collaboration with department heads/stakeholders. Support for new business channels mainly on operational processes and any other administrative duties assigned.

    • Manage effective business communications via available tools/platforms for information management and retrieval. Lead & coordinate knowledge transfer/training activities.

    Your Merits:

    Self-starter in managing channel communications/development within a GTM context and comfortable with the concept of 'end-to-end ownership' Multi-tasker - able to identify key Salesforce Professionalization priorities and stack-rank for execution and follow through Strong communications, negotiation and facilitation skills; comfortable presenting to a mix of technical/business audiences

    Company Overview

    Digi is a mobile connectivity and internet services provider enabling 12.3 million Malaysians to get the most benefit out of an increasingly connected world. With a strong legacy of product and services innovation delivered on Malaysia’s widest 4G LTE network, Digi now has an ambition to become our customers’ favourite partner in their digital lives providing relevant, personalised and engaging digital products and services that will further enable all Malaysians’ digital lifestyles. This is because Digi believes digital communication empowers everyone to improve their lives, build societies and secure a better future for all. Listed on Bursa Malaysia, Digi is part of global telecommunications provider Telenor Group and is a leader in driving progressive and responsible business practices.
    For more information about Digi, visit www.digi.com.my

    How To Apply

    If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
    Hope you find your dream education sector job in Selangor.
